theorem TBlemma3b:
assumes h1:"\<not> (ineM P M E)"
       and h2:"\<not> (ineM Q M E)"
       and subPQ:"subcomponents PQ = {P,Q}"
       and cCompI:"correctCompositionIn PQ"
       and chM:"ch \<in> M" 
       and chPQ:"ch \<in> ins PQ"
       and eCh:"exprChannel ch E"
shows "False"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
proof (cases "ch \<in> ins P")

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. ch \<in> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
 2. ch \<notin> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
assume a1:"ch \<in> ins P"

proof (state)
this:
  ch \<in> ins P

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. ch \<in> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
 2. ch \<notin> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
from a1 and chM and eCh

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ch \<in> ins P
  ch \<in> M
  exprChannel ch E
have "ineM P M E"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ch \<in> ins P
  ch \<in> M
  exprChannel ch E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ineM P M E
by (simp add: ineM_L1)

this:
  ineM P M E

 1. ch \<in> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
 2. ch \<notin> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ineM P M E
  \<not> ineM P M E
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  ineM P M E
  \<not> ineM P M E

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ch \<notin> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ch \<notin> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
assume a2:"ch \<notin> ins P"

proof (state)
this:
  ch \<notin> ins P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ch \<notin> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
from subPQ and cCompI and chPQ

proof (chain)
picking this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionIn PQ
  ch \<in> ins PQ
have "(ch \<in> ins P) \<or> (ch \<in> ins Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  subcomponents PQ = {P, Q}
  correctCompositionIn PQ
  ch \<in> ins PQ

goal (1 subgoal):

this:

 1. ch \<notin> ins P \<Longrightarrow> False
from this and chM and eCh

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ch \<in> ins Q
  ch \<in> M
  exprChannel ch E
have "ineM Q M E"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ch \<in> ins Q
  ch \<in> M
  exprChannel ch E

by (simp add: ineM_L1)

this:

goal (1 subgoal):
